mapper.select: SELECT ESNTL_ID AS esntlId, MBER_ID AS mberId, MBER_NM AS mberNm, PASSWORD AS password, EMAIL_ADRES AS emailAdres, MBTLNUM AS mbtlnum, MBER_STTUS_CODE AS mberSttusCode, DI_KEY AS diKey, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS lastUpdtPnttm FROM CMS_MEMBER WHERE ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId}
SELECT ESNTL_ID AS esntlId, MBER_ID AS mberId, MBER_NM AS mberNm, PASSWORD AS password, MBER_STTUS_CODE AS mberSttusCode FROM CMS_MEMBER WHERE MBER_ID = #{mberId}

SELECT ESNTL_ID AS esntlId, MBER_ID AS mberId, MBER_NM AS mberNm, EMAIL_ADRES AS emailAdres, MBER_STTUS_CODE AS mberSttusCode, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_MEMBER
AND MBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mberId}, '%')
AND MBER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mberNm}, '%')
AND MBER_STTUS_CODE = #{mberSttusCode}
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
